Primary_Text: Dihte karre dam nyjsenäjjam leeki jih hajkeli
Analyzed: Dihte	karre	dam	nyjsenäjjam	leeki	jih	hajkeli
Translation: This man hit the woman and ran off

Primary_Text: Manne daesnie tjöövkesne tjahkesjeminie prïhtjegem jovkeminie
Analyzed: Manne daesnie tjöövkesne tjahkesjeminie prïhtjegem jovkeminie
Translation: I am sitting here in the kitchen, drinking coffee
Now I want to talk Saami with you
Earlier, one used to hunt arctic foxes
When I was a little boy…

Primary_Text: Manne lohkeminie jih aehtjie moerh tjuahpa
Analyzed: Manne	lohkeminie	jih	aehtjie	moerh	tjuahpa
Translation: I am reading a book and father is choping wood
Don’t buy a book as expensive as this!
My mother is in the forest
I took a little bit from the bread
Father used to work with reindeer
I am studying to become a teacher
